PropertyValue.Value: select sta.station_cn_name, t1.para_desc, devType.Device_Name, t.device_id, t.para_type, t.para_version, t.para_file_name, case t.para_active_or_load when '00' then '未知' when '01' then '下载' when '02' then '激活' end para_active_or_load, t.update_date, t.update_time from para_dev_version_info t left join basi_station_info sta on sta.station_id = subStr(t.device_id, 1, 4) left join basi_dev_type_info devType on devType.Device_Type = subStr(t.device_id, 5, 2) left join basi_para_type_info t1 on t1.para_type = t.para_type
